name: Buy 1 Get 1 Free
description: If you buy a Main dish meal you get another one free

name: Over 20
description: If you spend over $20 you get a drink and side dish of your choice. (Soup is included)

name: Chop Rice no Meat
description: If you order Jallof Rice and nothing else we throw in 2 appetizers on us.

name: Soup Special
description: Buy soup and appetizers are 50% off.

name: Classic Comfort Combo
description: Enjoy a hearty Egusi Soup with Sweet Fried Plantains and a cold Coca Cola.

name: Sunset Fiesta
description: A refreshing Tequila Sunrise paired with a Chim Chim appetizer and Apple Pie dessert.

name: Spicy Savanna Special
description: Hot Ginger Tea served with Spicy Jollof Rice and Fried Peppered Snails.

name: McNiger Deluxe Bowl
description: Try our take on McSoup: Creamy Pepper Soup with French Fries/Wedges on the side.

name: Frozen Frenzy
description: Cool down with a Frozen Mango Slushie and a slice of multi-flavored Cheesecake.

name: Morning Delight Pack
description: Start your day right with Hot Milk Tea, Akara balls, and fresh Orange Juice.
